title: iMac ssd upgrade
message: NOOB question, customer wants to upgrade his defunct hdd with a ssd on an imac 1311 emc 2389, is there any cable or stuff to bypass the temperature sensor? i have read i should get an OWC cable but i don't know which one. thank you

title: iMac ssd upgrade
message: nah. i rather buy another dvd reader temp sensor and attach it to the place were there should be the hard disk one

title: iMac ssd upgrade
message: You're asking for something to "bypass" the sensor and I gave you the answer, but of course you can do whatever you want .....

title: iMac ssd upgrade
message: Tie them together it does not matter anyway if you install an SSD.

title: iMac ssd upgrade
message: There is literally no reason to have a hard drive sensor when you have no hard drive installed. The SSD will not get nearly as hot as the hard drive, and certainly won't need a sensor to monitor heat. You'll be spending time and money for no reason.
